    Our text to image conversion tool converts any text into an image by retaining its quality.
    Data Security

    Our text to image conversion tool is completely browser based and no additional software is required to be downloaded on your device.

    How to set alarm for minutes:

    1. Click on set alarm
    2. Set minutes for alarm.
    3. Choose sound of your choice.
    4. Click submit to set alarm, that's it !.

    Frequently Asked Questions

    • Will my file be saved after I complete working on the text to image conversion tool?

      No, we do not send any of your files to our servers all the operations are done on the browser itself therefore all your files are completely safe.

    • Do I have to do any additional signup or pay extra to use the text to image conversion tool?

      Absolutely not, our tool is completely online and does not require you to share any of your personal information with us, like email id, passwords etc. Our tool is completely free of cost.
